item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: Useful Python Basics
item.description: Getting Started This article will teach you how to Filter and Query your data using Python! The first thing you need to do is start up a Jupyter notebook. Then, type the following codes: import numpy as np import pandas as pd Import Data Iâ€™ll be using a csv file of London weather data (courtesy of the Coding Room). It includes maximum and minimum temperatures, the rainfall, and the number of hours of sun for each month.
